job.title: Embedded Software Engineer

and test in addition to kernel crypto moduleltligtltligtExperience with implementing REST APIs and working with JSON preferably in C or CltligtltligtExperience configuringdebugging embedded HTTPS serversltligtltligtBackground in data structures and algorithm designltligtltligtProficient in software development tools source code control environmentltligtltligtExperience designing and
